orig_text:
5.  IANA Considerations

   IANA has registered the UDP port number 6697, called "babel", for use
   by the Babel protocol.
correct_text:
5.  IANA Considerations

   IANA has registered the UDP port number 6696, called "babel", for use
   by the Babel protocol.
notes: Author Juliusz Chroboczek has agreed to use the port number 6696/udp for babel as per a discussion with Nevil Brownlee.  The port number in the document therefore should be changed to 6696/udp.
